Landmarks.label: Landmarks
Landmarks.designerEmpty: Add landmarks or mark that there is none.

Headings.label: Headings
Headings.designerEmpty: Add headings or mark that there is none.

Reading order.label: Reading & focus order
Reading order.designerEmpty: Add reading order and focus order (if different from the reading order).

Alt text.label: Alternative text
Alt text.designerEmpty: Scan for images and add alternative text where appropriate.

Contrast.label: Contrast
Contrast.designerEmpty: Scan for potential text contrast issues.

Color blindness.label: Color
Color blindness.designerEmpty: Check how the colors appear to different users.

Text zoom.label: Text resizing
Text zoom.designerEmpty: Generate screen with text at 200% and adjust layout and truncation.

Responsive reflow.label: Responsive reflow
Responsive reflow.designerEmpty: Generate a variety of viewport sizes and adjust content reflow.

Touch target.label: Touch target
Touch target.designerEmpty: Check for potential touch target issues.

Complex gestures.label: Complex gestures
Complex gestures.designerEmpty: Add alternatives to complex gestures or mark that there is none.
